new-widget.widget-text:
This is a space to write about using Mavo, an exciting new front end editor that bolts onto any HTML website. It gives you the ability to edit and create content without a relational database or advanced scripting.

This page is created and maintained using Mavo.

- Author in Markdown
- Connects to any site
- No database necessary
- Easy to deploy
- Fast
- Secure
- Plays nice with HTML
- Plays nice with SEO
